article_node.title: This Penny Stock Is Betting Big on the Animecoin Crypto. Should You Buy It Here?
article_node.summary: GameSquare (GAME), a small-cap media and technology company, is making a strategic move into cryptocurrency by adding Animecoin (ANIME-USD) to its treasury as part of a $2.5 million revenue agreement. This partnership will enhance GameSquare's presence in the Web3 space and provide immediate revenue while diversifying its digital asset holdings. Despite being a highly speculative penny stock, GameSquare's current valuation appears attractive compared to its peers.
